Dictionary.Name: The Free On-line Dictionary of Computing (27 SEP 03)

Definition.WordDefinition:
bon
<language> (From "Bonnie", {Ken Thompson}'s wife) A language designed by {Ken Thompson} and later revised by him to produce {B}.
[When? Features?]
(1997-02-04)

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Bon \Bon\, a. [F., fr. L. bonus.] Good; valid as security for something. [1913 Webster]
